author: @TIMESNOW
title: Baby Elephant Picks Up Trash, Throws It In Dustbin; Heartwarming Video Goes Viral
text:
Baby Elephant Picks Up Trash, Throws It In Dustbin; Heartwarming Video Goes Viral
An utterly charming and heartening video of a baby elephant disposing of litter in a roadside dustbin while walking alongside its mother has taken the internet by storm. Though the exact location of the incident remains unknown, the video has quickly gone viral, drawing widespread praise from both netizens and political figures. In the clip, the young elephant is seen picking up a piece of trash from the road and neatly placing it in a nearby bin, all while calmly walking beside its mother. This small yet impactful gesture of environmental consciousness has inspired admiration and self-reflection across social media platforms. Among those who shared the video was BJP leader and former Karnataka minister C T Ravi, who posted it on X (formerly Twitter) with the caption: “If a baby elephant can use a dustbin, why can’t we?” Reactions from users came pouring in. One commented, “Even elephants are not immune to the effects of our waste. A lovely indication by this baby elephant to human beings.” Another pointedly remarked, “A baby elephant just threw a can in the dustbin. Humans are busy throwing chips packets out of car windows. Who’s the real animal?” Several users described the moment as “grace meeting purpose,” highlighting how the young elephant seemed to show more civic awareness than many grown-ups. Image And Video Source - CT Ravi/X
